short_summary: Request for Supply Arrangement for real estate appraisal and valuation services
description: Tenders are invited for real estate appraisal and valuation related services for the Government of Canada.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4373199902
*   **Amendment Number**: 3
*   **Publication Date**: May 1, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 10, 2024, 2:00 pm EST (Note: New closing time)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services has released a Request for Standing Agreement (RFSA) solicitation, aiming to establish a pre-qualified list of accredited or designated real estate appraisers and related professionals. These professionals will provide real estate appraisal and valuation services across Canada.

**Terms and Conditions**
------------------------

The standing agreement will be established through a repeat of this solicitation process. It is essential to note that trade agreements, such as the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), may apply.

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5.

**Notice URL**
-----------------

For more information, please refer to the official tender notice on the Ariba Discovery platform: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19569666?extsite=MTk1Njk2NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Contact Information**
---------------------

To inquire about this standing agreement, please contact Marie-Ève Bouchard, Bilingual Contracting Officer, by email at [marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-eve.bouchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Reminder**
--------------

Please disregard the original posting response deadline and closing time. All offers must be submitted by June 10, 2024, at 2:00 pm EST, to be considered responsive. Offers submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive. Note that the services required are real estate appraisal and valuation related services. The goal of this RFSA is to select a pool of pre-qualified real estate appraisers and related professionals to provide these services to the
